treatment.description: Leaf blades triangular, broadly ovate, or elliptic, nearly as broad as long, thick, margins entire or with pair of basal teeth or lobes, farinose. Inflorescences glomerules on compound spikes or panicles. Seeds with margins rounded or acute; seed coat smooth.
